mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN AS grpFaclYn /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CON_FACL_CD AS conFaclCd /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL /* 채널고객사 블랙 시설 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN = #{grpFaclYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN = #{grpFaclYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1), EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL_PK(P),SYS_C0011282(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CON_FACL_CD = #{conFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL_PK(P),SYS_C0011283(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL_PK(P),FK_EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_EZC_CNCL(R),SYS_C0011284(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL_PK(P),FK_EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT_EZC_CNCL(R),SYS_C0011285(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL /* 채널고객사 블랙 시설 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN = #{grpFaclYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CON_FACL_CD = #{conFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN AS grpFaclYn /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CON_FACL_CD AS conFaclCd /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL /* 채널고객사 블랙 시설 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN = #{grpFaclYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CON_FACL_CD = #{conFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL.GRP_FACL_YN DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL SET /* 채널고객사 블랙 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND GRP_FACL_YN = #{grpFaclYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */ AND CON_FACL_CD = #{conFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_BLACK_FACL /* 채널고객사 블랙 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND GRP_FACL_YN = #{grpFaclYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 그룹 시설 여부, CHAR(1) */ AND CON_FACL_CD = #{conFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 연계 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
